summary.span: 包含与系统显示元素相对应的系统颜色、系统画笔和系统资源键。

span.span: Contains system colors, system brushes, and system resource keys that correspond to system display elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 不能声明此托管的类中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，但你可以使用其静态属性将中的值分配[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。You cannot declare this managed class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], but you can use its static properties to assign values in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
